com.samsung.android.sdk.pen.engine

Class SpenControlBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.view.View
      • com.samsung.android.sdk.pen.engine.SpenControlBase
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Drawable.Callback, AccessibilityEventSource, KeyEvent.Callback
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SpenControlContainer, SpenControlImage, SpenControlList, SpenControlStroke, SpenControlTextBox

    public abstract class SpenControlBase
extends View
    Control Base is a common control class for the object which been selected. It provides the basic methods for retrieving or modifying object and object property. (i.e object border drawing, Rect information, object style and MotionEvent etc.) The control could be easily retrieved from CanvasView.getControl(), the getObjectList() methods, return a list of objects ( which defined as SpenObjectBase).
    Since:
    3.0.0

    • Field Detail

      • STYLE_BORDER_OBJECT

        public static final int STYLE_BORDER_OBJECT
        Define the style of object border. the definition will drawing border depends on object attribute, if object is rotatable and resizable, then dashed line border, eight touching point and rotation knob are drawn and resizing and if object is only resizable, then dashed line border, eight touching point are drawn. if object is not rotatable and not resizable, then only line border is drawn.
        Since:
        3.0.0
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • STYLE_BORDER_NONE

        public static final int STYLE_BORDER_NONE
        Define the style of object border. If this style is set, then border is not drawn and resizing and rotating are not available.
        Since:
        3.0.0
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • STYLE_BORDER_STATIC

        public static final int STYLE_BORDER_STATIC
        Define the style of object border. If this style is set, then only line border is drawn and resizing and rotating are not available.
        Since:
        3.0.0
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • STYLE_BORDER_NONE_ACTION_NONE

        public static final int STYLE_BORDER_NONE_ACTION_NONE
        Define the style of object border. If this style is set, then only line border is drawn and resizing and rotating are not available, and no action is available like move.
        Since:
        3.0.0
        See Also:

      • onHoverEvent

        public boolean onHoverEvent(MotionEvent event)
        Called when hover events occur.
        This Method is override from android.View. and used for SDK internal use only.
        we recommend not to call this method directly.
        Overrides:
        onHoverEvent in class View
        Parameters:
        event - The MotionEvent instance
        Returns:
        true if hover event handling is enabled.
        false if hover event handling is not enabled.
        Since:
        3.0.0

      • fit

        public void fit()
        fit control region according to object's size in list. This will automatically update the position of ContextMenu.
        Since:
        3.0.0

      • onTouchEvent

        public boolean onTouchEvent(MotionEvent event)
        this function is called when touch event is occured.
        Overrides:
        onTouchEvent in class View
        Returns:
        true if touch event handling is enabled.
        false if touch event handling is not enabled.
        Since:
        3.0.0

        public void close()
        close the SpenControlBase instance. Call this method before destroying the instance to prevent memory leaks.
        Since:
        3.0.0

        Get the object border style.
        Returns:

        For more information, see Field Detail in this class.

      • setContextMenuItemEnabled

        public void setContextMenuItemEnabled(int id,
                             boolean enable)
        Enable or disable the specified context menu item.
        Parameters:
        id - The ID of the context menu item that you want to enable.
        enable - Set to true to enable the context menu item, set to false to disable the context menu item.
        Since:
        3.0.0

      • isContextMenuItemEnabled

        public boolean isContextMenuItemEnabled(int id)
        Check if the specified context menu item is enabled.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        true - if the context menu item is enabled.

        false - if the context menu item is not enabled.

        Since:

      • setContextMenuVisible

        public void setContextMenuVisible(boolean visible)
        sets context menu's visibility.
        Parameters:
        visible - context visible attribute.
        if visible is true then context menu will be displayed.
        if it's not, then context menu will be disappeared.
        Since:
        3.0.0
        See Also:
        isContextMenuVisible()

      • isContextMenuVisible

        false if the context menu is not visible.

        See Also:

      • setTouchEnabled

        public void setTouchEnabled(boolean enable)
        Enable or disable touch event handling.
        Parameters:
        enable - if it's true then control will handles touch event,
        if it's not then control ignores and passes touch event to behind window.
        Since:
        3.0.0
        See Also:
        isTouchEnabled()

      • isTouchEnabled

        public boolean isTouchEnabled()
        Check if touch event handling is enabled.
        Returns:
        true - control will handles touch event,
        false - control ignores and passes touch event to behind window.
        Since:
        3.0.0
        See Also:
        setTouchEnabled(boolean)

      • setMinResizeRect

        public void setMinResizeRect(RectF rect)
        Set the specified area as the minimum resize area. Size of mininum rect must be less than current size of object.
        Parameters:
        rect - The minimum resize area.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - Thrown if rect is null.
        Since:
        3.0.0

      • getMinResizeRect

        public RectF getMinResizeRect()
        Get the minimum resize area.
        Returns:
        The minimum resize area.
        Since:
        3.0.0

      • setDimEnabled

        public void setDimEnabled(boolean enable)
        Enable or disable dimming for the control.
        Parameters:
        enable - If true, everything behind this control will be dimmed.
        Setting this to false will also ensure that the screen does not change anything.
        Since:
        3.0.0
        See Also:
        isDimEnabled()

      • isDimEnabled

        public boolean isDimEnabled()
        Check if dimming is enabled for the control.
        Returns:
        if it's true then everything behind this control will be dimmed.
        if it's not then does not change anything on the screen.
        Since:
        3.0.0
        See Also:
        setDimEnabled(boolean)

      • getPixel

        public int getPixel(int x,
           int y)
        Get the color at the specified location. returns 0 if x or y are out of bounds (negative or >= to the width or height respectively). The returned color is a non-blended ARGB value.
        Parameters:
        x - The original raw X coordinate.
        y - The original raw Y coordinate.
        Returns:
        The color at the specified coordinate.
        This method returns 0 if x or y are out of bounds
        (negative or greater than the width or height respectively).
        The returned color is a non -blended ARGB value.
        Since:
        3.0.0
